input.sentences: for the party we used the side table as an `` open '' bar .
the chili took nearly all day | but i am sure it will be a hit .
everyone had a great time socializing as more and more guests arrived .
once everyone was here | we decided to light the candles on the cake .
it was a full house | but the party was a huge success .
output.sentences: It was rushing to get ready for the party and i set up the bar first because that would be the first place the guests would stop.
I checked on the chili and it was progressing well--it is always a hit.
My friends began to arrive in small groups but began to mingle and socialize right away.
The evening went fast and before I knew it the time had come to light the candles on the birthday cake.
This year my birthday party was a huge success and everybody posed for the annual photo.
